#!/bin/bash

# This script carries out all pre-processing steps for 16S rRNA gene sequences generated by Illumina sequencing.
# 06/15/16 version, AK, revised to include all pre-processing steps.
# 10/24/16 added full file path for FAST-X tool kit apps

#1 Use flash to merge Read 1 and Read 2 for each sample file. 
#  Paste flash commands from script generator spreadsheet below.
echo -e "\n\n Using flash to merge Read 1 and Read 2 for each sample file.\n\n"

### copy flash commands from script builder spreadsheet and paste in the commands in the space below ###
### don't forget to copy the sample names from the Names tab into the names.txt file ###

flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.005 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_005_CACAGTAGTA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_005_CACAGTAGTA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.013 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_013_GTTCTAGTCT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_013_GTTCTAGTCT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.032 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_032_GATATCGCAA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_032_GATATCGCAA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.038 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_038_TCTGTCAATC_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_038_TCTGTCAATC_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.039 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_039_TACTCGGTAT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_039_TACTCGGTAT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.040 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_040_TTCTCTTAGC_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_040_TTCTCTTAGC_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.041 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_041_CGGATATAGA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_041_CGGATATAGA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.042 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_042_TAGCAGTCAA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_042_TAGCAGTCAA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.049 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_049_GTGATATGGT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_049_GTGATATGGT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.051 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_051_TCGAGTGAAT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_051_TCGAGTGAAT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.052 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_052_TATGCACTCT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_052_TATGCACTCT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.060 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_060_CTGTCATAGA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_060_CTGTCATAGA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.064 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_064_CACTATGGAT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_064_CACTATGGAT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.068 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_068_GCTACTCATA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_068_GCTACTCATA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.069 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_069_TGTTGAGTTG_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_069_TGTTGAGTTG_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.R.078 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_078_CACTTATGCA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_R_078_CACTTATGCA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.01 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_01_CAACGTGAAT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_01_CAACGTGAAT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.03 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_03_CTACTAAGTC_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_03_CTACTAAGTC_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.04 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_04_CGATCTGTAT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_04_CGATCTGTAT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.05 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_05_CTTGTGCATA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_05_CTTGTGCATA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.06 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_06_GTCTCAACTA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_06_GTCTCAACTA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.07 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_07_TGTTCTCACT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_07_TGTTCTCACT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.09 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_09_GATAGGAGAA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_09_GATAGGAGAA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.10 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_10_CTATCTAGCT_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_10_CTATCTAGCT_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.11 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_11_TGAGAGAAGA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_11_TGAGAGAAGA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.12 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_12_CATCATAGTC_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_12_CATCATAGTC_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.13 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_13_GAGTCTCTAA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_13_GAGTCTCTAA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.14 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_14_TATCGTAGCA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_14_TATCGTAGCA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.15 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_15_TGATGCATTC_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_15_TGATGCATTC_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log
flash -M 215 -o MM17.TeoR.16 /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_16_CAAGTGTACA_R1.fastq /Volumes/SeagateHD/Maize\ Microbiome\ 2017/00_rawSeq/16S/V4_515F_New_V4_806R_New-MM17_TeoR_16_CAAGTGTACA_R2.fastq | tee -a flash.log


#2 rename individual sequences within each sample file
echo -e "\n\n Renaming individual sequences within each sample file.\n\n"

perl IlluminaFastQ_Rename.pl





#4 Filter sequences for quality.
echo -e "\n\nFiltering sequences based on quality.\n-q 30 : 99.9% minimum base accuracy\n-p 90 : percent bases in each sequence that pass the quality threshold)\n\n"

fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.002.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.002-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.005.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.005-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.013.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.013-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.032.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.032-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.038.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.038-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.039.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.039-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.040.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.040-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.041.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.041-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.042.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.042-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.049.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.049-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.051.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.051-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.052.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.052-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.060.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.060-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.064.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.064-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.068.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.068-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.069.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.069-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.R.078.renamed.fastq -o MM17.R.078-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.01.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.01-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.03.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.03-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.04.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.04-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.05.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.05-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.06.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.06-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.07.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.07-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.09.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.09-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.10.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.10-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.11.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.11-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.12.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.12-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.13.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.13-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.14.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.14-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.15.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.15-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt
fastq_quality_filter -Q 33 -q 30 -p 90 -i  MM17.TeoR.16.renamed.fastq -o MM17.TeoR.16-Filtered.fastq -v | tee -a fastq_quality_filter_log.txt

#5 Strip out quality information
echo -e "\n\nStripping out quality information and convert file to .fasta\n\n"


fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.002-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.002-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.005-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.005-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.013-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.013-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.032-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.032-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.038-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.038-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.039-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.039-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.040-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.040-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.041-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.041-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.042-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.042-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.049-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.049-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.051-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.051-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.052-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.052-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.060-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.060-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.064-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.064-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.068-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.068-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.069-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.069-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.R.078-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.R.078-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.01-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.01-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.03-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.03-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.04-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.04-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.05-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.05-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.06-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.06-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.07-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.07-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.09-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.09-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.10-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.10-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.11-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.11-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.12-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.12-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.13-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.13-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.14-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.14-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.15-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.15-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt
fastq_to_fasta -Q 33 -v  -i MM17.TeoR.16-Filtered.fastq  -o MM17.TeoR.16-Filtered.fasta  -v | tee -a fastq_to_fasta_log.txt

#3 Combine individual sample fasta files into a single fasta file for the project/run.
echo -e "\n\n Combining fastq files of individual samples into a single fastq file.\n\n"

cat *Filtered.fasta > 00_All-Samples-Filtered.fasta



#6 Move fasta file to usearch folder.
echo -e "\n\nMoving fasta file to usearch folder. Remember to change to the 02_usearch directory. \n\n"

mv '00_All-Samples-Filtered.fasta' '../02_usearch/00_All-Samples-Filtered.fasta'
